text: The fantasia (from ; also , , ) is a musical composition with its style in the art of improvisation. Because of this, it rarely follows any rules of strict musical form (as with the impromptu). ==Related pages== * Canzona * Capriccio * Chorale fantasia * Chromatic fantasia * Ricercar * Tiento * Voluntary ==Sources== * Brett, Philip, Jennifer Doctor, Judith LeGrove, and Paul Banks. 2001.
